taskDescription: Manages notifications from ALFRED for multiple clients
Encourages emotional engagement through interactive games
Manually decides what data to log by disabling automatic logging
Respects clients' privacy boundaries and preferences
Balances care needs with respect for user autonomy
Mediates between privacy needs and clinical demands
Uses detailed patient guidance provided by ALFRED
Plays games with clients to build rapport and engagement
Receive real-time health data updates for elderly clients
Schedule gentle reminders for medication for clients
Plan video calls to encourage clients' participation in activities
Limit notifications to avoid overwhelming clients and herself
Maintain control over what health data is shared from clients
Balance care coordination with respect for clients' privacy
Stay responsive to alerts at any time, including nights
Play games and encourage social chats and community event participation with clients
Respect client consent before sharing data with others
Seek clear boundaries for data sharing and notifications
Balance responsiveness with personal boundaries in caregiving
Embrace emotional and social aspects of care through ALFRED
Invite clients to scheduled video calls for shared game sessions
Use ALFRED’s platform to monitor multiple clients’ progress
